version_description:
Global Launching!
Download the game and go on an Adventure in the Empire of Elgrad!

- Text error revised

Global Launching!
Download the game and go on an Adventure in the Empire of Elgrad!

- Amount of gold obtained from Gold dungeon increased
- Text errors revised

Global Launching!
Download the game and go on an Adventure in the Empire of Elgrad!

- minor errors revised

Global Launching!
Download the game and go on an Adventure in the Empire of Elgrad!

- Chatting available with more languages!

Global Launching!
Download the game and go on an Adventure in the Empire of Elgrad!

- Minor errors revised

1st SwordMaster Story Contents Update! Lord of the Labyrinth Added!
Defeat the Minotaur guarding the labyrinth with a party with different attributes every day!

1st Costume Update! Gaia's Maid Costume added!
Appearance is also performance~ The original version is also pretty, but the costume is prettier!
Odin's Bunny Girl Costume added! Come meet a prettier and stronger Odin NOW!!

NEW CONTENTS UPDATE! Cain has been kidnapped?
Let's go save Cain at the Demon Tower!
Super strong Boss as a bonus~

1st New Character Update,
The master of the Heroes, Cayron is here!
Download and help the Sword Master. They are waiting for you!

Dark Lord School Costume Added
A transfer student so beautiful that she is the talk of the school!
She is...The Dark Lord?
Dowload and come see it yourself!!

Yui's Christmas costume added!
She heals mind and body!
The best healer and the best santa? It's Yui!

Hack & Slash continues at Christmas.
Collect Christmas Coins on the stages
Exchange them for 5-Star Tickets!

Don't miss out on this awesome event, log in NOW!

The new character? It's 'Belphegor'!
She might look cute but be careful!
You might have met strange characters on your adventures,
but Belphegor is with no doubt the weirdest!

-Minor Bugs fixed
-Text errors revised

Yui's Christmas costume added!
She heals mind and body!
The best healer and the best santa? It's Yui!

Hack & Slash continues at Christmas.
Collect Christmas Coins on the stages
Exchange them for 5-Star Tickets!

Don't miss out on this awesome event, log in NOW!

The new character? It's 'Belphegor'!
She might look cute but be careful!
You might have met strange characters on your adventures,
but Belphegor is with no doubt the weirdest!

-Optimization with several issues

New Character Kana added!
Performance, appearance, and even has a Raid Box?
A fully equipped dealer!
Download it right now and check it out~

The New Ideal Stone Update will help you push the limits!
The SwordMaster will continue to grow stronger in the New Year!

SwordMaster Story Half Anniversary!
To show our gratitude for all the love and support you gave us this last six months,
We have prepared a special Attendance Event!!
Don't miss out on this awesome opportunity~

Will you fight with us forever?

-Several bugs fixed

Some famous faces have appeared in Elgrad!!
Aqua, Meguming, Darkness, Wiz, and Kazuma arrive!
In addition, a new content Abyss Dungeon and a Afection System have been added!

Meet the Collaboration Limited Edition Characters right away~
If you miss this opportunity, you don't know when it will come again!

A spooky spirit new character, Rosie, appears in Elgrad! Meet Rosie, a cute new character with a strong buff effect!
The story has been unlocked until 1070!
Yui has a new swimming suit for the summer! Log into SwordMaster Story and check out our strongest healer's new costume~
